docs.abstract: Ernest Barra lr, commenting on fiscal imbroglio in NYC, asks why Mayor Beame must 'literally get on his knees and beg for money' from Gov Carey and Pres Ford; declares spectacle of 'mendicant Mayor' raises questions about obligations and responsibilities of state and natl govts in regard to NYC's financial crisis
